data.title: Hira Sweets – Authentic Indian Sweets and Food
data.text:
As the Saying goes,

“From humble beginnings, come great things.”

Nowhere else this expression is better exemplified than in the story of Mr. Hira Lal Sharma, the ‘Master Chef’ of our sweets industry. What bloomed as a small entrepreneurial dream in 1912, with only one outlet, in the outskirts of Delhi (Shahdara), the outlets has now blossomed into one of the largest confectionary manufacturing facilities in our country.

We take pride in adding grandeur to your special occasions and celebrations with our exquisitely handcrafted mithai. Our delicious sweets wrapped elegantly and tastefully, always leave a lasting impression. Be it a celebration, a gift or just an indulgence, at Hirasweets, we have something exclusive for everyone and every occasion!

We take pride in adding grandeur to your special occasions and celebrations with our exquisitely carefully made mithai. Our delicious sweets prepared elegantly and tastefully, always leave a lasting impression. Be it a celebration, a gift or just an indulgence, at Hirasweets, we have something exclusive for everyone and every occasion!

It is our mission to share with diners authentic and unique cuisines from the world over. To give them a never-before experience and make them ‘Feel Special’.

Hirasweets has always striven to go to great lengths to pamper and surprise patrons and ensure that every casual dining experience they have, is memorable. From sourcing ingredients from far-off lands to attentive service, it’s all done with one objective – to give diners an experience they will cherish forever.

We craft excellent quality baked goods which are value for money. We are a hand-crafted bakery brand that uses only the most authentic ingredients, processes and love! Each cookie, each cake is special, baked with love and attention almost as if it were baked in your own oven! That’s also the reason why we are different from everybody else. We offer a choice of Cakes, Pastries, Confectionery, Snacks and open range of Customized Gift, Festive Hampers and… much more for Individual and Corporate needs.

We craft excellent quality baked goods which are value for money. We are a hand-crafted bakery brand that uses only the most authentic ingredients, processes and love! Each cookie, each cake is special, baked with love and attention almost as if it were baked in your own oven! That’s also the reason why we are different from everybody else. No two loaves of our might look exactly the same. We offer a choice of Cakes, Pastries, Confectionery, Snacks and open range of Customized Gift, Festive Hampers and… much more for Individual and Corporate needs.
